entry.et: Middle English avis, advis view, opinion, from Anglo-French, from the Old French phrase ce m'est a vis that appears to me, part translation of Latin mihi visum est it seemed so to me, I decided

def.dt: :recommendation regarding a decision or course of conduct :counsel he shall have power, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, to make treaties United States Constitution
:information or notice given usually used in plural
:an official notice concerning a business transaction
